NOTE: (DON'T RESTART AFTER INSTALLATION!!!)

2.Now go to start, all programs, nero 8, toolkit then Control Center.
3.At the bottom uncheck (check for updates every: 30 Days). 
4.On the Left hand side click the KEY icon which says License.
Enter the following serials:

-Blu-ray/HD DVD Video Plug-in:- EC06-206A-99K5-2527-940M-3227-K7XK
-mp3PRO Plug-in:- 9C00-E0A2-98K1-294K-06XC-MX2C-X988
-Lame MP3 Encoder:- 4C04-5032-9953-2A16-09E3-KC8M-5C80
-LLS Plugin:- EC05-E087-9964-2703-05E2-88XA-51EE
-HDDVD_TEST:- 5C0X-205M-99M1-2435-2118-K246-1576

-BD_TEST:- 5C0M-6027-1869-2C4K-4001-81E0-K6CA
-Multichannel Plug-In:- 1A47-0009-4130-2214-0668-1641 or 1A47-0009-4130-2272-2688-0049

7.You are done


To remove Nero Scout, just execute: 
regsvr32 /u "%COMMONPROGRAMFILES%AheadLibMediaLibraryNSE.dll"
